TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PaintEventHandler(object sender, PaintEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed PaintEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub PaintEventHandler(sender As Object, e As PaintEventArgs)
public delegate void PaintEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, PaintEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 대리자를 만들 때, 이벤트를 처리할 메서드를 식별합니다.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 이벤트를 이벤트 처리기와 연결하려면 대리자의 인스턴스를 해당 이벤트에 추가합니다.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 대리자를 제거하지 않는 경우 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 이벤트 처리기가 호출됩니다.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 대리자와 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)합니다.For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에 줄과 텍스트를 그립니다는 제어 합니다.The following code examples draws lines and text on a control. [!code-cpp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/VB/form1.vb#1)]
